content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0167
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when comments are not unsolicited, free-text and voluntary
Outcome:
  Message: Comments are not unsolicited, free-text and voluntary
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0167
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Comments special-purpose domain provides a solution
                  for submitting free-text comments related to data in one or more
                  SDTM domains (as described in Section 8.5, Relating Comments to
                  a Parent Domain) or collected on a separate CRF page dedicated to
                  comments. Comments are generally not responses to specific questions;
                  instead, comments usually consist of voluntary, free-text or unsolicited
                  observations.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 1
                Section: '5.1'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO

json.Description: Trigger error when comments are not unsolicited, free-text and voluntary

Outcome.Message: Comments are not unsolicited, free-text and voluntary

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The Comments special-purpose domain provides a solution for submitting free-text comments related to data in one or more SDTM domains (as described in Section 8.5, Relating Comments to a Parent Domain) or collected on a separate CRF page dedicated to comments. Comments are generally not responses to specific questions; instead, comments usually consist of voluntary, free-text or unsolicited observations.
